content: here s what to expect during the cal the 2024 vvcal will begin march 22nd and run through august 2nd it is a slow-paced cal with 20 weeks look for cal posts here on this website cypresstextiles net each friday during the cal subscribe to post notifications in the sidebar so you don t miss a post the hexagon patterns are in us terms and uk terms written chart and video instruction form as well as step by step photos every friday during the cal i will release new hexagon patterns and we will make them then join them and add a zero-waste border at the end about halfway through i will release the entire cal condensed as a pdf for purchase
